00046 template <class MenuType>
00047 void CCommandTools::CreateMenu(const iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand& command, MenuType& result)
00048 {
00049        int prevGroupId = ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE;
00050 
00051        int childsCount = command.GetChildsCount();
00052 
00053        QMap<int, QActionGroup*> groups;
00054 
00055        for (int i = 0; i < childsCount; ++i){
00056               QString text = command.text();
00057               iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand* hierarchicalPtr = const_cast<iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand*>(
00058                                    dynamic_cast<const iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand*>(command.GetChild(i)));
00059 
00060               if (hierarchicalPtr != NULL){
00061                      QString text2 = hierarchicalPtr->text();
00062                      int groupId = hierarchicalPtr->GetGroupId();
00063                      int flags = hierarchicalPtr->GetStaticFlags();
00064 
00065                      if ((groupId != prevGroupId) && (prevGroupId != ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE)){
00066                             result.addSeparator();
00067                      }
00068 
00069                      if (groupId != ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE){
00070                             prevGroupId = groupId;
00071                      }
00072 
00073                      if (hierarchicalPtr->GetChildsCount() > 0){
00074                             QMenu* newMenuPtr = new QMenu(&result);
00075                             newMenuPtr->setTitle(hierarchicalPtr->GetName());
00076 
00077                             CreateMenu<QMenu>(*hierarchicalPtr, *newMenuPtr);
00078 
00079                             result.addMenu(newMenuPtr);
00080                      }
00081                      else if ((flags & ibase::ICommand::CF_GLOBAL_MENU) != 0){
00082                             if ((flags & ibase::ICommand::CF_EXCLUSIVE) != 0){
00083                                    QActionGroup*& groupPtr = groups[hierarchicalPtr->GetGroupId()];
00084                                    if (groupPtr == NULL){
00085                                           groupPtr = new QActionGroup(&result);
00086                                           groupPtr->setExclusive(true);
00087                                    }
00088 
00089                                    groupPtr->addAction(hierarchicalPtr);
00090                                    hierarchicalPtr->setCheckable(true);
00091                             }
00092 
00093                             result.addAction(hierarchicalPtr);
00094                      }
00095               }
00096        }
00097 }
